title: FBI Hired Social Media Surveillance Firm That Labeled Black Lives Matter Organizers “Threat Actors”
description:
A new Senate report calls out the FBI for lying to Congress about its social media monitoring, pointing out the FBI’s hiring of ZeroFox.

The post FBI Hired Social Media Surveillance Firm That Labeled Black Lives Matter Organizers “Threat Actors” appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Judges Keep Ruling That Anti-Trans Health Care Bans Make Shitty Law. The GOP Isn’t Giving Up.
description:
Republicans’ anti-abortion playbook shows they’re ready to fight the legal challenges — all the way to the Supreme Court.

The post Judges Keep Ruling That Anti-Trans Health Care Bans Make Shitty Law. The GOP Isn’t Giving Up. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: With Ukraine’s Cluster Bombs Killing Its Own Citizens, Biden Readies Order to Send More
description:
A new Human Rights Watch report says Ukraine’s use of the internationally banned weapon has led to civilian casualties.

The post With Ukraine’s Cluster Bombs Killing Its Own Citizens, Biden Readies Order to Send More appeared first on The Intercept.
